entry.title: Saturday night: A few flurries. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Flurries. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 07 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A few flurries. High minus 6.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light in the afternoon. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 23 in the morning and minus 11 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 07 January 2023
